amendment.description: To return to the individual States maximum discretionary authority and fiscal responsibility for all elements of the national surface transportation systems that are not within the direct purview of the Federal Government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1756 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 67. Record Vote Number: 36.

action.text: Amendment SA 1756 proposed by Senator Coats for Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S1535) To return to the individual States maximum discretionary authority and fiscal responsibility for all elements of the national surface transportation systems that are not within the direct purview of the Federal Government.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1756 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 67. Record Vote Number: 36.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1756 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 30 - 67. Record Vote Number: 36.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1756 proposed by Senator Coats for Senator DeMint.
